title: windows 10 crashes!!
body:
is anyone here getting crashes, computer suddenly restart, lag after a windows update a few weeks ago? cos i used to play lol all max settings and getting 256fps and no crashes what so ever, but after the update that i got from windows 10, all sudden my computer would completely crash and restart..if anyone know the issue and the fix to this pls let me know. thnx

how do i attach a dxdiag here.

replies.body: run in compatibility mode for windows 8 and enjoy
tried running in win 7,8 even vista still getting crashes

I recommend disabling the compatibility mode, as it can actually cause crashes on Windows 10. There was an anniversary update that enabled the Game DVR feature inside the Xbox Game Bar. This has been causing issues for some players, so I recommend [disabling it entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the problem.

Let me know if it helped.
disabled it and still get crashes

In that case, there are likely some hardware or driver issues we'll need to look into. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dive into some logs and work with you further.

Additionally, it would greatly help out our team if you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Im having the exact same problem and its ruined alot of my games and work that I have saved in other tabs with how sudden it is. I think I might have to quit league for a while because constant hard resets are not good for any computer

i lowered the settings to all low and 5 mins later pc crashed and rebooted lol..i dunno if i can stop playing lol, im too addicted to it..other games bored me to death.

anyway i hope they fix this soon!

yeah im getting it to for some reason my screen was windowed and any time i tried to put it as full screen the mouse would not be where it said it was on screen. I uninstalled it and now whenever i try to enter into any type of match it says i can't connect and boots me out with a bug splat. Windows and Riot need to have a talk or something...
